text: Mary Jo Watson is a Seminole art historian and director emeritus; Regents' Professor of Art History at the University of Oklahoma. ==References== Category:American art historians Category:Living people Category:Native American academics Category:Native American women academics Category:Native American curators Category:Seminole people Category:University of Oklahoma alumni Category:University of Oklahoma faculty Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Historians from Oklahoma Category:Women art historians Category:20th-century American historians Category:20th-century American women writers Category:21st-century American historians Category:21st-century American women writers
title: Mary Jo Watson
